content.rendered: Take your coffee on the go with a fashionable and functional keep up! The Kiosk Ash Kaffee Mug is built for your both cold and hot brews cravings anytime anywhere! From your morning coffee to evening tea, Kiosk Ash Kaffee Mug is a right match for you. It comes with an easy to sip lid, stainless steel, easy to carry feature and double walled to ensure premium quality. The mug is designed to be disassembled for thorough cleaning and is a pleasure to drink from, lid on or off. The shatterproof and unbreakable design is ideal for travel. Drink confidently on your next adventure, whether it’s at the beach, by the pool, camping, or on the boat.
